pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, April 25, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, April 25, 2018:

Ottawa, Ontario

10 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the W7: Feminist Visions for the G7 meeting and deliver brief remarks.

Pacific Room
National Arts Centre
1 Elgin Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:45 a.m.

2 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Bayview Yards facility and meet with local entrepreneurs.

7 Bayview Road

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity of the visit
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:15 p.m.
